data.name: GetCompany
data.value: Select CompanyId, DistrictId, CompanyName, CountryHead, isOperational from [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Company] where DeletedDate is null

data.name: GetCompanybyId
data.value: Select DistrictId, CompanyName, CountryHead, isOperational from [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Company] where DeletedDate is null and CompanyId = @companyId

data.name: InsertCompany
data.value: Insert into [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Company] (DistrictId, CompanyName, CountryHead, isOperational, CreatedDate) values (@districtId, @companyName, @countryHead, @isOperational, @createdDate)

data.name: UpdateCompany
data.value: Update [UnicoVehicle].[company].[Company] set DistrictId = @districtId, CompanyName = @companyName, CountryHead = @countryHead, isOperational = @isOperational, ModifiedDate = @modifiedDate where CompanyId = @companyId
